page.title: 19Employment in Hurworth
page.content:
The figures in this survey are based on the replies to a questionaire sent to the families of the junior school children. Approx 50% answerd the questions. Hurworth is an area of low unemployment with a high percentage of professional workers. No unemployed people returned the questionaire. Male employment _________________ 51% managerial/professional 23% skilled labour 12% unskilled 14% self employed
Average weekly mileage 150 miles
55% work in Darlington 16% locally 23% elsewhere in the region con....pg 20.
